english: At the moment, you remember your mother, Margarita and your father Jaime
spanish: Ahora mismo, te acuerdas de tu madre, María, y de tu padre, Francisco.

english: With whom you had three children, Alberto, Francisco and David.
spanish: Con quién tuviste tres hijos, Luis-Francisco, Jorge y Javier.

english: You have the respective three daughters-in-law, Almudena, María and Ana.
spanish: Tienes tres respectivas nueras: Socorro, Concha and Margarita.

english: Socorro and Luis-Francisco, from Alberto and Almudena
spanish: Almudena y Javi, de Luis-Francisco y Socorro

english: Jorge, Javier and Pilar, from Francisco and María
spanish: David, Jaime y Ana, de Jorge y Concha

english: and, Luis and Javi, from David and Ana.
spanish: y Luis y Alberto, de Javier y Margarita.

english: The objective is to remember all the members of your family, within the allocated time.
spanish: El objetivo es recordar a todos los miembros de la familia, en el tiempo asignado.

english: The next name to remember will appear in the bottom left corner.
spanish: El siguiente nombre que recordar aparecerá en la esquina de abajo a la izquierda.

english: You can access each name by selecting its family relationship…
spanish: Puedes acceder a cada nombre seleccionándo su parentesco...

english: … and you remember them by clicking on their name.
spanish: … y recordarlos al seleccionar su nombre.

english: You can now try navigating through the family tree.
spanish: Puedes probar a moverte a través del árbol familiar.

english: When you are ready to remember,
You don't remember any of your family members…
spanish: Ya no recuerdas a ninguno de tus familiares...
Has recordado a todo el mundo.

english: Your memory is not as fast as it used to. It will probably leave some lasting effects…
spanish: Tu memoria ya no es tan rápida como antaño, esto te va a dejar algunas secuelas...
parentescos entre los miembros de tu familia.
